::: {.column-page} I’m a Lead Data Scientist at **[TVS Motor](https://www.tvsmotor.com)**, working for connected mobility solutions department. My interests include **Machine Learning**, **Natural Language Processing**, and **Generative AI**. I have 10+ years of experience in the field of Machine learning and Data Science where I worked with various clients in developing prescriptive as well as predictive solutions to address core business problems.

### Major Projects ------------------------------------------------------- * Root Cause Analysis for Low Range Trips in EVs * Predictive Maintenance of Brakes in two wheelers * Range Prediction and Analysis for EVs * Cell Imbalance issues in batteries * Time to charge for EV Battery * Voice Assistant using RAG and LLMs * Churn Prediction in Telecom Industry * Price optimization Engine for Scientific Pricing of Fashion Products * NPS Improvement using explainable AI * Retail store segmentation * Anomaly Detection for machine parts failure ### Education * B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering * XII in Computer Science ### Courses * [Neural Networks and Deep Learning](https://coursera.org/share/df47600c32654a6020f4ec27cbc1f121) * [Improving Deep Neural Networks: Hyperparameter Tuning, Regularization and Optimization](https://www.coursera.org/account/accomplishments/verify/ZZLZ3U6GTBUL) * [Big Data Foundation](https://www.credly.com/badges/39dba64e-03a2-47ae-816f-c5064cb88d93/linked_in_profile) * [Introduction to Python](https://www.kaggle.com/learn/certification/vidyasagarbhargava/python) ## Honors & Awards * Thinking Hat at Wipro Limited | 2018 * Bull's Eye Award at Snapdeal | 2015 ## Talks & Webinars * Introduction to Deep learning at Wipro Technologies on June 2017.
